item.title: ABOUT
item.description:
“Itâ€™s not that I want to break things. I want to learn how they work.”

I am a security researcher with a passion for understanding the structures and mechanisms behind technology. My work is focused on deeply analyzing and learning how systems are built and function, from the ground up. I aim to explore, utilize, and optimize these structures to enhance security and gain a deeper understanding of how technology operates.
